# Visual Studio
.vs/
.vscode/

# Build results
bin/
obj/

# User-specific files
*.user
*.suo
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Auto-generated files
*.Generated.cs
*.Generated.json

# File-based database
*.mdf
*.ldf

# Temporary files
*.tmp
*.log
*.cache
*.csproj.user

# IIS and web project files
_IISExpress/
.localhistory/

# Rider and JetBrains
.idea/
*.sln.iml

# DotNet Tools
.dotnet_toolchain/

# Ignore unnecessary backup files
*.bak
*.swp
*~

# OS-specific files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Ignore generated files from the .NET SDK
project.lock.json
project.fragment.lock.json
artifacts/

# Prevent sensitive data files
secrets.json

# Ignore compiled output
*.dll
*.exe
*.pdb
*.apphost.exe
*.sourcelink.json

# Ignore test result files
TestResults/
*.trx

# NuGet Packages
*.nupkg
*.snupkg
packages/
